description: {"blocks":[{"key":"58jns","text":"This protocol describes our multiplex fluorescent immunohistochemistry protocol used to identify pathological signatures in human iPSC-derived cells within thin, fixed mouse brain tissue section series’. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32gs4","text":"We apply this workflow for post-mortem assessment of the inclusions within human iPSC-derived cells which have been transplanted into the living brain of athymic mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7641o","text":"30 um mouse brain sections were stored in anti-freeze solution at   until required. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4sesq","text":"Remove samples from freezer and equilibrate at   for   -  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"230a3","text":"Pour sections into a well insert in a 6-well plate to separate storage solution from section","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bs8kq","text":" Move the well insert to another well containing approximately   of 1x PBS. Wash at least 5x with 1x PBS for   each on an orbital shaker using low speed at  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":63,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":109,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":156,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"6":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apf2q","text":"Incubate the sections in 10mM sodium citrate buffer (pH9.0) for  . Let it cool to  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dc5cf","text":"Rinse the sections 3x  each in 1X PBS","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brbbc","text":"Weigh NaBH4 to make 0.1~0.5% in 1X PBS, made fresh","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asrav","text":"Move the insert with sections into the fresh-made solution for   at  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3kdnc","text":"Wash 2x   in 1X PBS","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eceme","text":"Incubate sections in normal donkey serum IF blocking buffer    on shaker 60 rpm","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3bqem","text":"Make primary antibody cocktails in blocking buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nuj5","text":"Prepare ~  per sample of primary antibody solution consisting of selected primary
antibody (diluted appropriately) in home-made normal donkey serum IF blocking
buffer","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"16oeu","text":"Transfer sections from well insert into wells of black porcelain spot plate containing
primary antibody solution to bind to the antigen(s) of interest","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5evdf","text":"Place the plate on a rotating mixer using low speed (speed 7 rpm) and incubate   at
  (or 3X night/ over weekend)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":79,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":259200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c7c82","text":"The following day, pour sections into a well insert in a 6-well plate to separate
sections from primary antibody solution.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53op7","text":"Wash sections 3 times with 1x PBST at  . Note:   for the first two rinses, 3x   for additional washing","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"amgcp","text":"Prepare   per sample of secondary antibody solution consisting of appropriate
secondary antibody + Hoechst 33342 (diluted accordingly) in blocking buffer (shield
solution from light)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1kll8","text":"Transfer sections into the black porcelain spot plate containing  secondary
antibody cocktail","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"77d45","text":"Incubate for   at   on orbital shaker using low speed (shield solution from light).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4nces","text":"Pour sections into a well-insert in a 6-well plate containing 1X PBST to separate sections from the secondary antibody solution","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ham4","text":"Continuing to shield samples from light, wash 3 times with 1x PBS for   at  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":7,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":8,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"6":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"7":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"8":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8g97","text":"Pour sections into a glass petri dish","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7509g","text":"Submerge a glass slide into the 1x PBS and use a fine paintbrush to coax the sections towards the slide","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s6br","text":"Gently tap the sections onto the slide, making sure there are no wrinkles or folds","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45v3v","text":"Repeat until all sections are mounted onto the slide(s)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"daamu","text":"After sections are dried onto the slide(s), about   at   or until sections look opaque (remember to shield slides from light), apply an appropriate aqueous mounting medium\n(hardening or non-hardening). Antifading (DAKO Fluorescence Mounting Medium\nis preferred if using a fluorescent conjugated secondary antibody","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":202,"length":58}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bf3mn","text":"Using tweezers, place a coverslip on top of the medium. Cover with filter paper and press down firmly to remove excess mounting medium","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gp1","text":"Image sections using an appropriate microscope. Store in a dark slide box at  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":77,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"flo8b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24fk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"162em","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
